info.title: Steel Browser Instance API
info.description: Documentation for controlling a single instance of Steel Browser

proxyUrl.description: Proxy URL to use for the scrape. Provide `null` to disable proxy. If not provided, current session proxy settings will be used.
Proxy URL to use for the scrape. Provide `null` to disable proxy. If not provided, current session proxy settings will be used.
Proxy URL to use for the scrape. Provide `null` to disable proxy. If not provided, current session proxy settings will be used.
Proxy URL to use for the session

userAgent.description: User agent string to use for the session

httpOnly.description: Whether the cookie is HTTP only

sameSite.description: The same site attribute of the cookie

expires.description: The expiration date of the cookie

topLevelSite.description: The site of the top-level URL the browser was visiting at the start of the request to the endpoint that set the cookie.

hasCrossSiteAncestor.description: Indicates if the cookie has any ancestors that are cross-site to the topLevelSite.

partitionKey.description: The partition key of the cookie

session.description: Whether the cookie is a session cookie

sameParty.description: Whether the cookie is a same party cookie

sourceScheme.description: The source scheme of the cookie

sourcePort.description: The source port of the cookie

cookies.description: Cookies to initialize in the session

localStorage.description: Domain-specific localStorage items to initialize in the session

sessionStorage.description: Domain-specific sessionStorage items to initialize in the session

indexedDB.description: Domain-specific indexedDB items to initialize in the session

sessionContext.description: Session context data to be used in the created session

isSelenium.description: Indicates if Selenium is used in the session

blockAds.description: Flag to indicate if ads should be blocked in the session

optimizeBandwidth.description: Enable bandwidth optimizations. Passing true enables all flags (except hosts/patterns). Object allows granular control.

skipFingerprintInjection.description: Flag to indicate if fingerprint injection should be skipped for this session.

deviceConfig.description: Device configuration for the session. Specify 'mobile' for mobile device fingerprints and configurations.

logSinkUrl.description: Deprecated: Log sink URL to use for the session

extensions.description: Extensions to use for the session

persist.description: Flag to indicate if session should be persisted

userDataDir.description: User data directory path to use for the session

timezone.description: Timezone to use for the session

dimensions.description: Dimensions to use for the session

userPreferences.description: Chrome user preferences to customize browser behavior (e.g., font size, popup blocking, notification settings)

extra.description: Extra metadata to help initialize the session

duration.description: Duration of the session in milliseconds

eventCount.description: Number of events processed in the session

creditsUsed.description: Amount of credits consumed by the session

websocketUrl.description: URL for the session's WebSocket connection

debugUrl.description: URL for a viewing the live browser instance for the session

userAgent.description: User agent string used in the session

proxy.description: Proxy server used for the session

proxyTxBytes.description: Amount of data transmitted through the proxy

proxyRxBytes.description: Amount of data received through the proxy

solveCaptcha.description: Indicates if captcha solving is enabled

isSelenium.description: Indicates if Selenium is used in the session
